Entries.Tabitha0: I... I'm a little in shock!$7
Entries.Tabitha1: I need to sort everything out with Theo! And pack my things! Ah!$6
Entries.Theo0: Are we really doing this? We are, aren't we?$6
Entries.Theo1: Tabby is going to flip out... in a good way, of course.$l

Entries.Tabitha: Eggs are important in baking! Let me know what you think of the sweets. I helped make them, of course.$h
Entries.Theo: Where did Tabby go...? I'm always so awkward at these events.$s

Entries.Tabitha: I wonder if anyone will ask me to dance with them? *giggle*$l
Entries.Theo: Man, I wish this festival was actually about flowers and not just dancing... It's so misleading.$s

Entries.Tabitha: Look at all this wonderful food! Theo and I brought some special spices to add to the soup. How about you, @?$h
Entries.Theo: Phew, there's a lot of people here... I came over here for a breather.

Entries.Tabitha: @, you made it! You can join Theo and me if you'd like. When do you think the first one will show up?
Entries.Theo: I'll admit I'm looking forward to seeing the jellyfish. There was never anything like this back where Tabby and I are from.

Entries.Tabitha: Mmm, these burgers are delicious! I wonder what Gus' secret is?$h
Entries.Theo: Are you any good at this game? I feel like it's rigged.$3

Entries.Tabitha: AGH! @! See, I told you this was too scary for me, Theo!$s
Entries.Theo: Aw, come on, Tabby! You always drag me to festivals I don't want to go to, so I think it's only fair you come to this one. I'll keep you safe, don't worry!$h

Entries.Tabitha: Theo didn't want to come because of the snow. I'll have to have twice as much fun for him!
It's the best day of the year! I want to tell you who my partner for the gift exchange is so badly, but I know I can't.$h
Entries.Theo: I guess the holiday cheer is a bit contagious. This is a pretty nice event.

Entries.Tabitha: Oh my gosh, this is perfect! You're so thoughtful, @. Thank you so much!/220 221 341 608 731 724 614/Wow, this is great! Thank you, @!/245 246 376 815 417/Hm... Well, it's the thought that counts, right?/167 348 459 257 205 404 281/Oh. I'll just... put that over here./303 304 346 456 457 729 422/For me? You shouldn't have! Thanks!/203/
Entries.Theo: How'd you know this is my favorite? I'm kinda touched./605 235 425 595 274/Oh, I actually really like this. Thanks, @./-74 430 376/...I hope you're either really oblivious or just joking./306 307 733/Ugh. You can just say you don't like me, you know./729 732 717/Huh. Thanks./-2 -19 420/

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Tabitha...#$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Tabitha...#$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Tabitha in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Tabitha in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.Utility.cs.5373: @... Theo...#$b#As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and husband!$h

Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Theo in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.244/f Tabitha 2000/e 236: none/18 10/farmer -100 -100 0 Tabitha 11 9 0/warp farmer 3 14 0/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 3 0 1 true/emote Tabitha 56/move farmer 0 2 2/move farmer 5 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/emote farmer 32/emote Tabitha 16/faceDirection Tabitha 2/speak Tabitha "@! I didn’t expect to see you here.$7#$b#I don’t come here often myself, but... Remember that fight I had with Theo?$s#$b#I’ve been really inspired by how hard you work, @.#$b#So I took what you said that day to heart. I’m trying to study some math and economics so I can help Theo with the accounting.#$b#We’ll see how far I get, though. I didn’t want to bother Theo by asking him for help.$3"/pause 600/question fork2 "I’m sure I’ll be fine!#You should ask Theo for help. He’d be happy!#Yeah, you’ve got this, Tabitha!#I could help you, if you want."/pause 400/fork helpTabitha/speak Tabitha "Right! I’ll check out these books and head home.$h#$b#Thanks for the encouragement, @! You’re the best.$h"/end
Entries.helpTabitha: speak Tabitha "Oh! I... I would like that a lot. That’s sweet of you, @.$l#$b#Let’s sit at the table over there, yeah?"/emote Tabitha 20/move Tabitha 5 0 2 true/move farmer 5 0 2 true/move Tabitha 0 1 1/move farmer 0 1 1/move farmer 3 0 1 true/emote Tabitha 60/move farmer 0 -2 3/speak Tabitha "So... as a farmer, you must do a lot of accounting, huh? Can you tell me about that?"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 500/emote Tabitha 20/end dialogue Tabitha "I showed Theo what you taught me and he was really happy!$h#$b#I seem to thank you for a lot of stuff, @, but really, thank you. You’ve been an amazing friend to me.$l"

Entries.277/f Tabitha 2500/e 244: none/14 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Tabitha 20 22 3 Theo 20 23 3/move Tabitha -5 0 2 true/move Theo -4 0 3 true/move Tabitha 0 1 1/pause 200/speak Tabitha "I’m glad you came shopping with me, Theo. It’s nice to spend time together outside of the café."/warp farmer 1 23/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/speak Theo "Sure. You’ve really stepped up lately, Tabby. It’s been a big help, so I’ll help where I can as well.$h#$b#But also... I might not get to hang out with you much more, since things are looking so serious for you and @.#$b#You’ll be living on that farm before you know it.$h"/pause 200/emote Tabitha 16/pause 200/speak Tabitha "Theo! Shut up!$a"/pause 200/move farmer 10 0 1 true/emote Tabitha 12/emote Theo 16/pause 500/speak Theo "Speak of the devil! I’ll give you two some alone time.$h"/pause 200/emote Theo 32/move Theo 20 0 1 true/warp Theo -100 -100/faceDirection Tabitha 3/pause 200/speak Tabitha "@?!$7#$b#H-How much of that did you hear?$6"/pause 400/move farmer 3 0 1 true/emote Tabitha 28/pause 500/question fork0 "#You want to come live on the farm? I like the sound of that.#Not much."/pause 400/fork romanceTabitha/faceDirection Tabitha 1/pause 500/speak Tabitha "Oh... Well, um...$s"/pause 400/faceDirection Tabitha 3/pause 300/speak Tabitha "@, what would you think of me living on the farm with you?$l"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I don’t know. Why do you ask?#I’d love that. But you know what that implies, right?"/pause 500/fork romanceTabitha/emote Tabitha 40/pause 300/speak Tabitha "Ah, nevermind. It was a silly thought.$s#$b#Do you wanna walk back to the café with me?$h"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.romanceTabitha: playMusic musicboxsong/speak Tabitha "@, you’re making me blush!$l#$b#You mean it, though?$l"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 500/animate Tabitha true false 3000 33/showFrame 101/pause 3000/showFrame Tabitha 12/showFrame 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Tabitha "I don’t know if I’ve ever told you, but I love you, @.$l#$b#I guess Theo was right after all, huh?$h"/pause 400/emote Tabitha 60/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Tabitha "*giggle*$l"

Entries.742/f Theo 500/t 600 800/w sunny/z winte: none/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Theo 64 19 2/pause 200/emote Theo 16/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 500/faceDirection Theo 3/pause 500/faceDirection Theo 1/pause 500/faceDirection Theo 0/pause 800/emote Theo 28/pause 500/speak Theo "*cough* Ah, hi. I wasn’t expecting you to come out.$7#$b#I’m not used to people waking up as early as me and Tabby. I forgot farmers are early risers too.#$b#I promise I’m not being creepy; I just wanted to check out your farm... I like plants a lot. This is all pretty impressive."/pause 500/speak Theo "$q 551 null#...If you don’t want me to come around like this, I understand.#$r 551 25 event_farm1#You’re welcome to visit any time!#$r 551 -15 event_farm2#You shouldn’t be snooping around here without permission."/pause 500/emote Theo 40/pause 500/speak Theo "Well, things are awkward now... I’ll head out.$3#$b#See you around, I guess."/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.236/f Tabitha 1500/t 800 1800: desolate/39 10/farmer 41 11 3 Tabitha 39 11 2/pause 500/emote Tabitha 12/pause 500/faceDirection Tabitha 1/speak Tabitha "...Hi.$s#$b#*sigh* I got into a fight with Theo... I took a walk out here to clear my head.$s#$b#Theo said I’m not being responsible enough with the café. That I’m avoiding doing the hard work and making him do it instead.$a#$b#He volunteered to do the paperwork, though!$a"/pause 500/emote Tabitha 28/pause 500/faceDirection Tabitha 1/pause 200/speak Tabitha "$q 603 null#I’m doing enough work... right?#$r 603 -250 tree_event1#Theo’s right. You’re being really immature about this.#$r 603 20 tree_event2#You do work hard, but Theo might not be here to help forever.#$r 603 0 tree_event2#Have you tried thinking about things from Theo’s perspective?"/faceDirection Tabitha 2/pause 300/speak Tabitha "Sorry for getting you mixed up in my drama, @.$s#$b#I think I want to be alone for a while now. Thanks for talking, though.$3"/end dialogue Tabitha "I’m thinking about a lot right now.$3"
Entries.777/f Theo 2500/w sunny/z winter: none/48 79/farmer 41 78 1 Theo 48 79 2/pause 500/move farmer 5 0 2 true/emote Theo 16/faceDirection Theo 3/move farmer 0 1 2/move farmer 1 0 1 true/emote Theo 32/pause 200/speak Theo "@! How did you find...$7#$b#Ha, nevermind. I should stop being surprised that you’re able to find me wherever weird place I am.$h#$b#The weather’s great today. I was just enjoying the scenery here. Want to join me?"/pause 500/faceDirection Theo 2/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 3000/emote Theo 40/pause 1000/speak Theo "You know... I was thinking about you right before you showed up.$l#$b#We’ve been... Er, at least, I feel...$6"/pause 300/faceDirection Theo 1/pause 100/emote Theo 28/pause 400/speak Theo "*cough* Sorry I’m so awkward at this...$s"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Theo 3/pause 300/speak Theo "All right. I... I wanted to say that I love you, @.$l#$b#We’ve been together for a little bit, but... I want you to know that I’m serious about you.$l#$b#I see a future here with you in Stardew Valley."/pause 600/question fork1 "#I love you too, Theo.#I can’t say I feel the same way."/pause 400/fork rejectTheo/playMusic musicboxsong/emote Theo 20/pause 500/speak Theo "Wow, I’m so relieved to hear you say that. And so happy!$l#$b#I finally know what I want to do with my life."/pause 500/showFrame Theo 28/showFrame 101/pause 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Theo "Will I ever be able to stop blushing? I’m not sure, not after that.$6#$b#I’m really happy, though.$l"
Entries.rejectTheo: friendship Theo -1250/speak Theo "...Ah. I... don’t really know what to say, now.$s#$b#I guess I misread your feelings. Sorry.$a"/pause 400/emote Theo 12/pause 400/speed Theo 5/move Theo 8 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Theo "Were you just playing with my feelings?$a"

Entries.722/f Theo 1000/z winter: sadpiano/41 40/farmer 29 45 0 Theo 39 41 2/pause 100/move farmer 0 -5 1 true/emote Theo 40/move farmer 8 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Theo "This is a weird place for you to be, @.$3"/pause 300/move farmer 1 0 2/pause 500/speak Theo "I’m thinking that I’ll leave this town eventually. There’s not really anything for me here.$3#$b#Problem is... I don’t know what I’ll do when I’m somewhere else.$s#$b#I came here to help my sister, but also because I didn’t know what else to do with my life at the time.$3#$b#I haven’t changed at all...$s"/pause 600/question null "#Just do what you’re passionate about!#I’m sure you’ll figure it out.#It’s too bad you want to leave so soon."/pause 200/speak Theo "...I guess.$3#$b#*sigh* Well, at least for now, I can’t leave Tabby alone.$s#$b#See you, @.$3"/pause 400/move Theo 2 0 1/move Theo 0 -1 1/faceDirection farmer 1/move Theo 2 0 2/move Theo 0 1 1/move Theo 3 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.227/f Tabitha 1000/d Wednesday /t 900 17: none/8 22/farmer -100 -100 0 Tabitha 12 25 3 Pierre 4 17 2/pause 400/emote Tabitha 40/pause 200/speak Tabitha "Hm... Where is it...?$3"/move Tabitha 0 -2 0/move Tabitha -2 0 0/pause 500/emote Tabitha 8/pause 300/warp farmer 6 29/playSound doorClose/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/faceDirection Tabitha 2 true/pause 500/speak Tabitha "Hi, @! Over here!$h"/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Tabitha 3/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 200/pause 100/speak Tabitha "Fancy seeing you here, haha!$h#$b#I don’t suppose you could help me find some nutmeg? I’m having a little trouble tracking it down."/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 200/faceDirection Tabitha 0 true/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 500/playSound shiny/move farmer -4 0 2/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Tabitha 3/playSound money/emote Tabitha 20/pause 200/speak Tabitha "Thank you so much, @. I can always count on you!$h#$b#I’m stocking up on ingredients for the week."/pause 400/emote Tabitha 16/pause 100/speak Tabitha "By the way, do you have any suggestions for something I should bake? I’m looking to try something new and different!"/speak Tabitha "$q 890 null#A new recipe idea? #$r 890 50 shop_event1#Pumpkin-maple mousse.#$r 890 30 shop_event1#Green tea cannoli.#$r 890 0 shop_event2#White chocolate chip cookies.#$r 890 -15 shop_event3#Chicken cupcakes with ketchup frosting."/pause 200/faceDirection Tabitha 0/speak Tabitha "Now, I need some yeast... Where was that again?$3"/end dialogue Tabitha "It was fun shopping with you today, @. Thanks again for your help!$h"

Entries.222/f Tabitha 500/t 1600 2200: jaunty/43 73/farmer -100 -100 0 Tabitha 45 74 0/pause 300/move Tabitha 0 -2 0/emote Tabitha 40/pause 500/emote Tabitha 12/pause 500/move Tabitha -4 0 3/move Tabitha 3 0 1/move Tabitha -3 0 3 true/warp farmer 32 72 1/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 200/emote Tabitha 16/pause 500/speak Tabitha "Oh! Hi, @. I didn’t expect to see you here.$7"/pause 500/move farmer 8 0 1/pause 800/speak Tabitha "I suppose you’re wondering what I’m doing...#$b#Well, I heard that people hang out in the saloon a lot, so I was thinking of going to try and make some new friends!#$b#But... I’m nervous. I don’t like alcohol, and I’m worried people might judge me.$s"/emote Tabitha 28/pause 500/speak Tabitha "$q 412 null#What should I do...? #$r 412 25 event_saloon1#Everyone’s nice. They wouldn’t judge you for that.#$r 412 -10 event_saloon2#If you’re uncomfortable, don’t go in."/pause 300/speak Tabitha "See you later!"/move Tabitha 4 0 1/move Tabitha 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Tabitha -100 -100/end
Entries.772/f Theo 1500/z winter: desolate/63 19/farmer 57 23 1 Tabitha 63 16 2 Theo 62 16 2/pause 500/speak Theo "...So, I wanted to tell you that I think I might leave Pelican Town pretty soon.$3"/pause 200/faceDirection Tabitha 3/pause 100/emote Tabitha 8/pause 300/speak Tabitha "What are you talking about, Theo? Why would you want to leave?$s#$b#I can’t run the café without you...$s"/pause 400/speak Theo "You know I never intended to stay here too long, Tabby. We talked about it before we came here.$3#$b#I just wanted to give you a heads-up so that you can learn some accounting.#$b#You’ll need to take over my responsibilities for the café once I’m gone."/pause 400/emote Tabitha 12/pause 400/faceDirection Tabitha 2/pause 300/speak Tabitha "Oh, whatever. You won’t even have the motivation to move away, anyways.$a#$b#You certainly don’t have it for anything else!$a"/pause 200/faceDirection Theo 1/pause 300/emote Theo 12/pause 400/speed Tabitha 4/move Tabitha 0 20 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Theo 2/pause 100/move Theo 0 1 2/pause 300/emote Theo 16/faceDirection Theo 3/pause 500/speak Theo "Oh, you're here...$7#$b#...You heard all that, didn't you? Sorry you had to see that, @.$s#$b#I’d better go after her.$s"/pause 300/faceDirection Theo 2/pause 200/move Theo 0 6 2/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.727/f Theo 2000/w sunny/z winter: none/19 62/farmer 17 55 2 Theo 18 59 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 4 1 true/emote Theo 56/pause 400/faceDirection Theo 3/pause 200/speak Theo "Hey, @. Nice to see you.$h#$b#If you’d like to keep me company, I wouldn’t mind."/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Theo 2/pause 100/emote farmer 56/emote Theo 56/pause 500/speak Theo "I’ve been helping Evelyn with the public gardens. It’s been fun.$h"/pause 1000/speak Theo "$q 645 null#Even if I don’t know what I’m going to do with my life, at least I have gardening.#$r 645 50 event_garden1#Having some help on the farm could be nice.#$r 645 20 event_garden2#Why don’t you grow ingredients for the café so it’ll be self-sustaining?#$r 645 10 event_garden3#It’s always good to have a hobby."/pause 400/speak Theo "You know, you’ve honestly helped me like Pelican Town a lot more than I initially did.#$b#Maybe I’ll end up staying after all. Especially if you stick around.$l#$b#Don’t tell Tabby I said that, though. She’d never let me live it down.$6"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.BusStop.1: ` Bus Stop^East: Pelican Town^South: The Stray Catfe
Entries.CafeOutdoors.1: Various herbs and flowers. They're all healthy and clearly well-loved.
Entries.CafeIndoors.1: It's still warm from the last batch of pastries!
Entries.CafeIndoors.3: It's the door to the pantry. No place for a customer!
Entries.CafeIndoors.4: Looks like Tabitha is always sure to save some pastries for herself.
Entries.CafeIndoors.6: The drawer is filled with receipts and billing statements.
Entries.CafeIndoors.7: There are plants from all over the world in here.
Entries.CafeIndoors.8: It's Theo's computer, where he does all the cafe's accounting. Better not mess with it.
Entries.CafeIndoors.9: The radio station seems to change every time you come in. Are Tabitha and Theo fighting over the music?
